I hereby declare that the immovable property described in the 3rd paragraph of the Schedule below, valued at Rs. 63,000/- in words, sixty-three thousand rupees, as described above, is my daughter, and I hereby declare that I have affection for you. In consideration of your love, I do hereby transfer the said property to you free of charge with all the rights and interests therein, without any compensation. Therefore, from now on, you shall construct and use the immovable property described in the schedule, and shall register it in your name in the records of the relevant office, and shall pay the taxes due to the Sri Gram Panchayat, with the changes and decreases, and shall receive receipts in your name, and you shall enjoy the happiness of your children, grandchildren, descendants, descendants, and all rights of donation and sale in perpetuity. Since there is no financial deficiency in my life due to the transfer of this property to you, I shall take possession of the said immovable property immediately. I have written this settlement document with all my heart and soul and given it to you, believing you. Schedule Details:- Parvathipuram Manyam District, Salur Subdistrict Salur Mandal, Annamrajuvalas Gram Panchayat, Annamrajuvalas Grama Panchayat, as per the revenue census of Annamrajuvalas Grama Panchayat, the measurements and boundaries of the vacant land without any structures are as follows: Measurements: - 13 acres (3-965 sq m) for the upper and lower sections and 54 acres (16-470 sq m) for the lower sections and 78 acres (65-52 sq m) for the upper sections. Boundaries of the vacant land are as follows: 1. The lower section is the small Somulu Gari Taluka Daba House. 2. The Panchayat CC Road. 3. The CC Road. 4. The U. The immovable property between the above boundaries of the village headman's vacant land
is subject to this settlement deed. This property is not an assigned property.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement deed No. 212 of 2024, dated 23/Jan/2024, executed by Mavudi Thoudu in favour of his daughter Mavudi Kumari, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 78 Sq. Yds, comprised in survey number 290, situated in Annamarajuvalasa Village & Gram Panchayat, Saluru Mandal within the District of Parvatipuram Manyam registered at sub-registrar office Saluru is bounded as follows: North by: Vacant Site of Gramakantam South by: Panchayathi CC Road East by: RCC Road of Chukka Chinna Somulu West by: CC Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
